rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0001
rows.name:
To hire me, you must have a
discerning eye... Ah, my apologies.
Thank you for choosing me.

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0002
rows.name:
I am satisfied to be entrusted
with such a rewarding job.

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0003
rows.name:
Aiming for efficient operation,
I shall guide this mercenary
group to become even better!

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0004
rows.name:
...My apologies. It seems my
aristocratic side is hard to shake.
